an3.128:1.3: goyogapilakkhasmiṁ → goyogamilakkhasmiṁ (sya-all, km, mr) | caramāno → caramānaṁ (mr)
an3.128:2.1: kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu → bhikkhu bhikkhu mā kho tvaṁ (bj, pts1ed)
an3.128:2.2: āmagandhena → āmagandhe (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | nānvāssavissantīti → nānvassavissanti (pts1ed); nānubandhissanti (mr)
